text: Gréville-Hague is a former commune. It is in Normandy in the Manche department in northwest France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of La Hague.Arrêté préfectoral 27 September 2016 A hamlet (Gruchy) of the village is the birthplace of Jean-François Millet, a painter. == References == Category:Former communes in Manche
title: Gréville-Hague
